QuestData.Title: The Real Race
QuestData.Description:
Ok, Darkmoon Racer, let's see what you got!
The real race has four legs: get to the blue post, then green, then red, then back here.
Your time matters, so do it fast!
QuestData.LogDescription: Run through the Start Banner, hit the Blue Post, then the Green Post, then the Red Post, then return to the Start Banner.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Start Banner with a Darkmoon Game Token
